item.description: New England GHOST has 2 cancellations for Rose Island Lighthouse Investigation...THIS SUNDAY! November 6th. Boat leaves from Goat Island about 10 a.m. Everyone should be there at 9:30, at the latest. Parking is FREE and I have passes for you. Lobster boat ride over is free! Stay in the lighthouse or the very haunted barricks Investigate the entire 24 hours & be a lighthouse keeper Lunch, Dinner & Breakfast is included, we ask everyone to bring a side dish to share...should be something NON perishable. This is a terrific place to investigate!!! There is power, its heated and bottled water is supplied. Price per person is $35 THERE ARE ONLY 3 TICKETS AVAILABLE! If you want to go, please do not wait...these tickets will be gone before you know it. Payable through paypal...please email Aimee for a paypal invoice to be sent to you. My email address is: indigoskkye@aol.com, include the email address associated with your paypal account. If you do not have paypal, its still payable through debit or credit card.
item.name: Rose Island Lighthouse Investigation...THIS SUNDAY!
